structure.unit: ACQUISITION AND DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC PROJECTS THROUGH REVENUE BONDS

law.text: In the event a governmental agency is unable to acquire, by purchase or agreement, any real property deemed necessary for the purposes of a public project, such agency may acquire the same by condemnation. The procedure for condemnation shall be as provided in the Eminent Domain Act of Kentucky.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 20. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 14.
